summary.Title: Kvalitetskontrolingeniør
summary.Presentation:
Quality Control Engineer
We are currently looking for an Quality Control Engineer for our team based in Nykøbing Falster, Denmark

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Quality Control Engineer

We are currently looking for an Quality Control Engineer for our team based in Nykøbing Falster, Denmark.

As an effective Quality Control Engineer, you have a great eye for detail and good organizational skills. You will perform both internal and external audits and carry out your tasks autonomously and collaboratively.

As a Quality Control Engineer you will be part of our quality department and work closely with our development and production team in controlling the quality of our products and services for sustainable growth. The goal is to contribute in keeping and improving quality standards during the production process and to maintain them after the commercial release.

Your tasks         

  • Supervising production quality by doing testing and reviewing test results
  • Improving, auditing and maintaining our QEMS (ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001)
  • Performing interim and final inspections
  • Optimizing and improving the supplier quality process
  • Physical control of incoming goods and capturing findings in documentation
  • Supervising and support during Start of Production

About TKH Airport Solutions

TKH Airport Solutions is an innovator in airfield ground lighting (AGL). We provide a revolutionary AGL technology called CEDD®: contactless energy and data distribution. A smart solution for airports that increases the efficiency, safety and reliability of the airfield lighting infrastructure.

TKH Airport Solutions is one of the operating companies of the Dutch stock-listed TKH Group NV. TKH is the parent corporation of an internationally active group of companies specializing in the creation and delivery of innovative telecom, building and industrial solutions. Being part of the TKH Group, our company can build on a history of 90 years in smart connectivity, energy distribution and AGL.

Your qualifications

  • 3+ years of experience within a similar role (QPA)
  • Fluent communication skills in English and Danish
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Focused on details while not losing the overall picture
  • Teamplayer with practical hands-on mentality

How to apply

Interested and looking for a challenging yet fulfilling job that will make you proud? Please contact our HR Manager Kimberlie Elevelt at + 31 53 574 14 56 or apply directly via hr@tkh-airportsolutions.com.
